name: prettier-importmap-demo
description: Demo showing Prettier usage via importmap instead of devDependencies

scripts.size:traditional: npm install --save-dev prettier && du -sh node_modules && npm uninstall prettier
scripts.size:importmap: du -sh node_modules 2>/dev/null || echo 'No node_modules - using importmap!'
scripts.compare: npm run size:importmap && npm run size:traditional
